reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, super soft, and extremely cozy to wear. They appreciate its warmth, with one customer noting it's perfect for colder weather, and like its style, with one mentioning it looks more expensive than it is. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it generous, others say it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL … JUST BUY IT!!!
items.body: WOW - I was so pleasantly surprised by the quality, softness, design and fit of this sweater. So much so, that I purchased three different colors. However, the one downside is “sizing”. I initially purchased a Large (recommended) in Black & Dusty Rose but they were very big. Subsequently, purchased the Khaki in Medium which is a perfect fit. As a result, I submitted a return/exchange for the Black & Rose for a Medium but Amazon would only let me do a return which is okay. But, when I reordered both sweaters in a Medium the price was significantly higher than what I originally paid for them. Needless-to-say, I did not reorder; will wait to see in price comes down. Other than this issue, this sweater was a great purchase. Read more
items.author: PjPete

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: True fit. Feels expensive, looks great! Read more
items.author: Rosemary

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, cute but color off on my monitor
items.body: This fit well in my normal size and was soft and roomy but not sloppy. It was pretty much the perfect sweater except for the color. Based on my monitor, I expected the red to be a wine red and the flowers to be charcoal gray. The sweater was way more red than I wanted and the flowers were green. It did not fit my purposes and I have no tolerance for hearing everyone remark on my wearing a Christmas colored sweater in the fall before Thanksgiving (just my weirdness...not a reflection on the sweater). It was pretty, but yes, could easily be a Christmas sweater. Beautiful sweater just not right for what I needed. Read more
items.author: AR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love wearing it.
items.body: It is a wonderful sweater that I have worn 3 times already. Gotten lots of compliments. Soft, fits well, warm and I'm glad I bought it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
items.body: Love the look,& feel of material... The Finished product is of good quality. Read more
items.author: Larita Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Well made and soft and comfortable. Get compliments every time I wear it Read more
items.author: Cynthia L. Brazen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very eye catching
items.body: Runs true to size… Get a lot of compliments when I wear it Read more
items.author: Dorothy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good sweater
items.body: It was a nice sweater. However not my type .. the color was good and fit was okay.. material was nice and comfortable.. but it didnt look right on me.. Read more
items.author: Sonya Smith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z Red 1, Z Mist Green, Z Red 2, Blue, Apricot, Y Beige, Black, Z Dark Green, Navy Blue, Red, Rose Red, Y Orange2, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
